author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A real favourite, these burgers are exceptionally tasty and always juicy, as minced lamb has extra fat.
name: Minted Lamb Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a barbecue for cooking. In a large bowl, mix together all the ingredients for the burgers until well combined.

With damp hands (to help stop the mixture sticking to your fingers), divide the mixture into 4 balls and roll each one between your palms until smooth. Flatten each ball out to a large, fat disk, 3cm high, and pat the edges in to tidy them up.
Place the burgers on a plate, cover with cling film, and chill for 30 minutes (this helps them keep their shape on cooking).
Cook over a hot barbecue for 68 minutes, turning as needed, until the meat is springy to the touch and the edges charred.
Serve with a selection of buns, or pitta breads, and the suggested accompaniments, and let everyone assemble their own burgers as they prefer.
